item.title: Accrual vs. Cash Accounting in Federal Spending Discourse
item.author: peter.borocz@gmail.com (Péter Böröcz)
item.description: In listening to the debates recently regarding both the historical tax cut of the Trump administration against the various COVID relief acts and a potential infrastructure bill, I noticed that we conflate the argument by not distinguishing between two fundamentally different ways of looking at money flows.
